org.czentral.util.stream

Class Feeder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.czentral.util.stream.Feeder

  • public class Feeder
extends java.lang.Object
    A facility which feeds the data from an InputStream to a Processor until the Processor finishes its work. Since data is being red in chunks, in most cases a surplus of data is red. This unprocessed data will be kept in the buffer after each feedTo is done and will be available for subsequent calls.
